Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: mkimber
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use instead of my bulky SLR with lenses which can be too,  much to carry around...and this camera doea it all!  The zoom can be grainy when used to the fullest extent, but when not zoomed the angle is quite wide and the macro has two great settings, regular and ultra.  The camera also has an awesome panorama setting!  There are many functions, you need to read the manual. The only negative points I have so far is the fit of the lens cap (not tight enough, falls off) and the battery/sd card compartment is difficult to open and close, the plastic is cheap.  Not for rough use. The recent shots I took of a local visit to somt Tall Ships are awesome!

Reviews.Title: Good Entry Level Camera
Reviews.Author: RS45AZ
Reviews.Content: The Fuji FinePix S2980 isn't an amazing camera, but don't let that put you off of it if you're interested in a budget entry level camera or a cheap/lightweight point & shooter.It definitely doesn't do too well indoors or in low light conditions, but that's to be expected in a camera this affordable. Time between shots isn't the best but I've suffered much worse. The panorama mode is pretty nifty too.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: ND
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because my old Sony died. I looked at a few different ones before landing on the Fuji. My only complaint so far is that runs off four double A batteries and not a rechargeable one. I know that I can buy rechargeable double As, I just haven't done it yet. Other than that, I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Real Estate Broker
Reviews.Content: Purchased camera for my wife to replace a similiar Fuji camera that was excellent.She took great pictures & used it for years with no problem.Unfortuneately, this camera took unclear low quality pictures from the start.Bought it in June 2012.In December 2012 had it repaired because it displayed "TURN OFF THE CAMERA AND TURN ON AGAIN" & would not work.In August 2013 had the same problem.Called Fujifilm North American repair department in NJ & they will not repair it since the warranty expired in July 2013.Repair would be a minimum of $80.00.I don't feel the camera is worth getting repaired because of poor pictures taken in the past. Also,having the same repair problem within 7 months raises a red flag.So, I will trash it & not be buying another Fujifilm product.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera for beginner photographers
Reviews.Author: N. Cousino
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic for those who have never known anything other than your cheap, standard 'point and shoot' cameras that don't allow for any customization.  This camera offers all of your standard 'point and shoot' options, but it also offers so much more so for those who want to learn this is a great (and affordable) way to do so.This Fujifilm Finepix camera has so many options and features I couldn't begin to cover them all, but some of my favorite are the red eye removal, panoramic feature, continuous shooting, intelligent flash, blink detection, scene recognition, and there is even a PhotoBook Assist that helps you create your own photo books.  Once you get comfortable with your camera you can create your own settings by controlling the aperture and shutter speed, and even save your favorite settings to use again.  The camera comes with an extensive and very thorough yet easy to understand manual that covers all of these options and settings.The only feature I'm not in love with is the video recording option - it works in a pinch, but it's not fantastic.  Zooming while recording video reduces the quality of the image, and the sound is not great - there is always some residual white background noise and you can hear the sound of the lens zooming in and out while recording.  It's ok for recording something at the spur of the moment, but for filming special events you definitely want something better.Overall I'm very pleased with this - photography has become much more interesting and exciting and I've made it a habit to never leave home without my camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the money
Reviews.Author: SoccerCoach
Reviews.Content: Camera showed up on time.  For the money, this camera is packed with great features such as 18x zoom and the ability to switch between an LCD screen and view finder.  The view finder is a great feature in bright sunlight.  The controls are easy to understand & very intuitive.

Reviews.Title: Awesome !
Reviews.Author: Shaggydoo
Reviews.Content: I was so impressed with this camera I bought a second one for my daughter as a graduation gift. She has been using it everyday since she received it. 5 star product. 5 star company.5 star service. I will buy more from this company in the future.

Reviews.Title: Buena camara para principiantes!
Reviews.Author: Luis Martinez
Reviews.Content: Very Good Camera for a rookie like me. The pictures are wonderful and the flash works perfect!I love it..!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: bumpy nail
Reviews.Content: I decided to go with a SLR camera after being annoyed by the long delay of a regular digital camera.  There is a little bit of delay with this one but not nearly enough of one to bother me.This camera is so easy to use.  I usually put it in different modes to take the same picture just so I can see the variations. The best thing is the panorama mode.  You take 1 picture and then turn either right or left and in the view finder it shows you exactly where to stop to line up a perfect shot next to the one you just took.  It really is a neat function.  You can do this with 2 or 3 shots and set it up to go right or left.  I'm always amazed at how much can be done in such a small package.  I did buy a case for this to carry extra batteries and a battery charger but you can throw this in your purse, too.  If, like me, you carry a big purse.  It's not small like a camera phone but its not huge either.  This is the best compact camera I have ever bought and the results are terrific!

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Natalie A
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in May 2012 and I took good care of it and by February 2013 it  is not working I am very disappointed

Reviews.Title: Good entry level dslr camera!
Reviews.Author: justanotherguy
Reviews.Content: Like this camera for entry level photographer as it has good options for picture taking and a good zoom, but we've had a couple of difficulties with the lens not retracting all the way and camera having to be reset to fix.  Not sure if it is single camera issue or more systematic problem of this model.  Time will tell.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm Finepix
Reviews.Author: hogbyte
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera for my daughter's birthday. She loves it. Its a great first digital camera for a novice photographer.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm Finepix Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Nelson
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera with a very good zoom lens.  I have had many cameras over the years,  including some that cost over $1000. and this is almost as reliable.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm Finepix S2980 Digital Camera (14Mp, 18X Optical Zoom) 3 Inch Lcd.
Reviews.Author: Johni
Reviews.Content: Have a Nikon but these Fijifilm Finepix cameras will always be a favorite. They are light, easy to handle, even for big hands like mine take great pics and this one take a fine video, too

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kay Lodahl
Reviews.Content: Nice to have a camera that allows use of so many manual settings beyond the automatic programming.  I am glad I purchased this item..

Reviews.Title: The viewfinder is the big plus.
Reviews.Author: Tony Killinger
Reviews.Content: It's a fine camera to start out with and 99% of us non-pro photographers will be more than satisfied, but having that option of setting up your shot on the screen or through the view finder makes it indispensable to me.  Too bright or too dark?  It doesn't make any difference, you can see your set up regardless of the ambient light conditions.

Reviews.Title: Good "next step" camera
Reviews.Author: Kita Nolley
Reviews.Content: I'm not a photographer -- I've always used point-and-clicks. This camera has been a great next-step camera for me as I graduate from the point-and-clicks. The pictures are vivid and the camera is very easy to use. It travels well and I really like it. Like I said, I am not a photographer. I travel extensively and wanted something to capture great moments. This is a good intro camera to the SLR world.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for a full function camera
Reviews.Author: momidb
Reviews.Content: Today's reasonably priced cameras no longer have a viewfinder and rely solely on the LCD display. Since these cameras also typically run on batteries, the use of the display depletes the charge fairly quickly. The Fujifilm camera has a great 3 in. display and a viewfinder. I shot photos mostly using the viewfinder thus mitigating the drainage on the 4 AA batteries. With a 14MP resolution and 18X optical zoom (can be augmented by setting up digital zoom in the set up menu), and an extensive set of features, this camera is a great value. BTW, photo quality is very good especially in low light (great for museum/cathedral etc... that do not allow flash photography). A rechargeable battery would have bumped my rating to a 5.

Reviews.Title: Quite Nice Beginner Camera
Reviews.Author: Indio Latino
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife because she became interested in photography. She told me not to go "overboard" and to find a "nice" camera. So far, we find this a perfect camera for the beginner. She has taken some pretty impressive pictures, and the camera seems very nicely constructed, so no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Finepix S2980
Reviews.Author: lunieh
Reviews.Content: Nice camera for the price.I still have to learn all the features and am having fun doing so.You can't go wrong with this one.

Reviews.Title: this camera has PROBLEMS
Reviews.Author: martsis
Reviews.Content: The motor that drives the lenses is so picky it quits without warning or cause. Turn your camera off and back on is the prompt.. you'll need a new camera or expensive fix.  Nobody online has a fix, much less Fuji, they're no help at all, only a nightmare. In the meantime, I have a camera that was a couple hundred dollars plus a mega new card and can't use it. Less than 3 months old and used a handful of times. Shame on Fuji and dealers that won't flat out tell customers that they're screwed when they call for help. I've had mine too long, can't take it back with my reciept. Don't buy this camera, Fuji Finepix S2980 or S2900 series

Reviews.Title: good semi professional camera
Reviews.Author: Alexandre Santos
Reviews.Content: Good camera and good images done. I have enjoyed a lot. It has easy adjusting and many options to get good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Overall good; auto mode not quite perfect
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: I've now had this camera for several months. Overall, I am satisfied with the purchase. I have taken many excellent pictures. The battery life seems very good (I'm using rechargeable batteries). I love having the viewfinder option and using basic AA batteries (two of my main reasons for choosing this camera over others)The reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the auto mode doesn't always produce the same quality of photos as the point-and-shoot I owned before this. With a little care and some adjustments, this camera has served me well. It has the option of changing many settings and I have taken some pretty nice pictures with a little care. But when I just grab it to quickly take a photo I've been slightly disappointed at times.But, that all said, I like it and am satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Perfect bridge camera at this price point
Reviews.Author: marquez mullins
Reviews.Content: Wow what can I say it does everything and more than I expected at this price point , it takes very clear pictures and is very user friendly , I'm not the biggest camera guy so this was just perfect for me !

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: I purchased an older camera for one purpose. Price. I had need of a digital camera with a good zoom and looked at many. I like that this item was offered new, never used, and I had gotten it for a very good price. The industry continues to improve on the megapixels and zoom cameras, but I didn't need the newest, just something that worked for me. I still haven't explored all of it's features, but enjoy the zoom very much so far, as I like to take wildlife photos.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm S2980
Reviews.Author: Jariah Edgehill
Reviews.Content: I give this camera five stars.Why? Because it meets all the standards that it said it would meet.every description of this camera was legit.I would recommend this camera to someone maybe someone just starting not that much of a professional camera

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Libanovik
Reviews.Content: since I have never had one caamere like this one, I really love it. It's quite simple to use it, very good images. I feel confortable with this camera

Reviews.Title: Seems good so far
Reviews.Author: Kris
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  Only reason for not 5 stars is the battery life. Since you have to replace the batteries I would recommend getting recharable batteries cause this camera really eats up the battery life.

Reviews.Title: Birthday present
Reviews.Author: Mary Jo Nutt
Reviews.Content: We got this for my daughters birthday. She loves it. It is easy to use and takes great pictures. All the latest

Reviews.Title: Terrible camera for the average mom!
Reviews.Author: Kimatdcl
Reviews.Content: This is by far the worst point-and-shoot camera I have ever owned.  Eighty percent of the time or more, the pictures come out blurry, out of focus, dark, etc., and this is under still conditions.  When someone actually moves when you're trying to take the picture, forget it - it won't even take the picture!  There is no "action" setting as far as I can tell, and I have tried all of the settings to no avail.  The flash completely bleaches out faces.  In full sunlight, with a still subject, the pictures are decent, but in any other conditions, they are terrible.  The hardware is flimsy.  The cap falls off constantly.  My old Olympus 6 megapixel was superior in every way and I wish I still had it!!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for 3 weeks until it quit working!
Reviews.Author: starstruck
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased when I got this camera. It was very light weight, fit the hand well, and took good pictures. However, after about 3 weeks when I would turn it on it would say "turn camera off and turn on again". I noticed the zoom lens would not move on it. Something seemed to be locked up. After reading about others with the same problem I had no choice but to return it...which I might add that Amazon made it VERY EASY to do. Apparently Fuji needs to work on this problem because otherwise it was a very nice camera for the price. I was disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Much more than I had hoped
Reviews.Author: Annette Designs Statement Jewelry
Reviews.Content: I am an artist and need great close ups. this Finepix works beautifully. Now I can post photo or enter competition with no problem. I would recommend this camera to those who want professional results at a great price value

Reviews.Title: Best Camera Ever!
Reviews.Author: junebuggy
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera today (super fast shipping from Amazon, btw) and it's already by far the best camera I've ever owned.  It's incredibly user-friendly and I've already used it to take photos for my work's website - everyone was impressed!  The panoramic setting works great and is super easy to use.Best. Camera. Ever.

Reviews.Title: Still looking...
Reviews.Author: Kae L. Aschettino "KY Vet Tech"
Reviews.Content: Bought this after my S1000fd finally broke on me (banged it up one too many times) and was pretty disappointed with it. I bought it because even though I loved the S100fd, I wanted an upgrade (more MP and Optical zoom) but was very unimpressed the the noise of the higher ISO (like I read in other reviews) and the auto-focus was slow (when it worked) and the LCD screen to review the pictures was pretty grainy and even though looked fine when uploaded to my PC, still couldn't get the comparison of how much better the playback on the S100fd was. I did really like the panoramic feature, but honestly didn't have it long enough to 'play around' with a lot of other features. I returned it without much of a second thought.... just didn't impress me the way I thought it would despite the similar bad reviews.

Reviews.Title: Very comfortable camera to use.
Reviews.Author: SpaceShipRuthie
Reviews.Content: Very comfortable camera to use. Of course there are many cameras better, but they also come with a much higher price tag. I do mostly night shots of the sky, and use this with a Telescope, and for the brighter planets and the moon, it works really well. Optics are exceptional.

Reviews.Title: First Camera
Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: I've been using my dad's high end canon camera to learn the ropes of photography, and then for Christmas I got this one for my own. I was thrilled. I love this camera, with the quality of shots and the great zoom.The two things that I hate about this camera are as follows:1: You MUST NEVER LOSE the cable that comes with the camera for connecting it to the computer. There is no oer way to download your pictures. My cable has been misplaced, so for the past month or so Ihaven't even been able to download the images straight from the Memory Card, like I'm able to do with other cameras. the card reads as blank unless it's connected directly from the camera.2: You have no option for fine-tuning the zoom manually. There is a switch with which you control how zoomed the image is, but it is incredibly difficult to get the zoom just right with the switch.

Reviews.Title: fathers day
Reviews.Author: Lyn CC
Reviews.Content: Dad is very happy with this very easy to use camera . Takes beautiful pics , love the zoom on it . great pics of the birds in the back yard , very close up

Reviews.Title: A+
Reviews.Author: Philip
Reviews.Content: When I bought this camera I was a bit skeptical because of the price but it turns out that it works amazing.  It takes high quality pictures and video.  I love my new SLR camera.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: KayDee23
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, shipping was speedy and exactly what I wanted. This was such a bargain price for this awesome camera. My best friend has the same camera and paid double what I did for it. Box came with all info and warranty cards. Nothing missing. Perfect!

Reviews.Title: Never had a chance to really use it
Reviews.Author: Mercia George
Reviews.Content: The button got stuck on the first day and after that it wouldnt take any pictures. I tried for hours to make it work again but now luck. i was really looking forwarded to using it.
